titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the University Club of New York Souvenir Album, 1902- RL.01322
titlestmt.author: Processed by: Kimberly Sims; machine-readable finding aid created by: Kimberly Sims

repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library

did.unittitle: University Club of New York Souvenir Album
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: The University Club of New York is a private social club. The album has 12 photographs of the Club's building.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], University Club of New York Souvenir Album, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: The University Club of New York Souvenir Album were received by the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library as a purchase in 1975.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The University Club of New York is a private social club whose charter dates back to 1865.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of an album of 12 photographs (19.5 x 25 cm.) of the University Club building. There is 1 of the exterior and 11 of the interior.
